problem.title: CheckPoint: Compressing a Spring
problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,3,1) c=lc_random(1,3,1) d=lc_random(1,3,1) m=lc_choose(a,2.0,4.0,5.0) k=lc_choose(b,200,300,600) h=lc_choose(c,0.8,1.5,2.5) x=lc_choose(d,0.12,0.15,0.19)
q= m*9.8* h-0.5* k* x* x
problem.p: A small block of mass $m kg slides down from the top of a rough inclined plane that has a vertical height $h m. The block strikes a horizontal spring with force constant $k N/m and compresses it a distance $x m before it comes to a momentary stop. How much energy is lost in this process (due to friction)? Use g = 9.8 \(m/s^2\).
